person.persName: James Henry Arnold (Boonville, Owsley County, Kentucky tailor and soldier)

body.p: Boonville, Owsley County, Kentucky tailor and soldier. Virginia native. Son of Routhford and Sarah Fade Arnold. Married to Harriet Arnold. Father of Eudocia Arnold, Samuel P. Arnold, Stephen C. Arnold, Green A. Arnold, Alexander Arnold and Charles C. Arnold. Tailor in Owsley County in 1860. Served in the Three Forks Battalion (U.S.A) as a second lieutenant from August 27, 1864 to July 17, 1865.
